name: Freespace 2075
overview: Control your player around the screen, and drop a space mine so that the enemies will smack bang into it. As soon as enough enemies have been hit, you will advance on to the next level. "This was my first ever long(ish) game project in 1999, which took a few months to make, so did not really get a widespread release until 2000. " ~ Richard Bayliss
